strapiPost.title: Cities Announce First Thursday and First Friday Events
strapiPost.content:
Along with Farmers Markets and a season of live concerts, spring also means the return of First Thursday and First Friday events for Fayetteville and Bentonville!

  • Time to gather: Each month downtown Fayetteville and downtown Bentonville host block parties featuring market vendors, artists, food, and entertainment. Each event has a theme to look forward to as well. 
  • Around the corner: Bentonville’s first First Friday event will be April 1 with the theme Run Bentonville. Fayetteville’s First Thursday will kick off May 5, stay tuned for the theme. Vendor and sponsor applications are available now!

For more info about Bentonville's First Friday, click HERE. Stay up to date with Fayetteville's First Thursday announcements HERE.
